name: .BTIF File Extension
summary: Learn about .BTIF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Check image format used by NationsBank that contains compressed image data and ASCII text; includes information that describes the check issue date, paid date, and amount of each check in the file.

content: BTIF files also use the .BTF extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
